name: Kolton Vail
text: The pizza here is THE BEST IN TOWN! Great service, lovely people, and the decor really supports the local high school. The prices are with paying every time. The owner is awesome and does his best to make sure all customers are welcome and â€¦More

name: Jack Pinskiy
text:
Love the staff!! Pizza is amazing!! Recommend going here if you want some awesome!!
We came all the way from Texas to visit and have pizza from hereðŸ˜Š

name: Benjamin Kibbey
text: Great pizza, also ice cream and locally owned with very reasonable prices. Would be a great place to order out or for a sit-down  family meal. Very warm, friendly and inviting atmosphere, yet low key and quiet.

name: Todd Bender
text: Stopped by on my way to Kootenai Falls and was greeted by a friendly staff and excellent pizza. Just what I needed before hiking out to the swing Bridge. Highly recommended!

name: Annie Legrand
text: I've dinner here 3 times now and love it. The food is delicious.  The calzons are to die for!!  And they deliver to Troy with a 35 dollar purchase, not bad :)

name: Sonja Beuskens
text: Friendly service, delicious food. Great sizes at great prices. Best sweet tea i've had!

name: Jeff Van Fleet
text: My wife and I had a very strange experience here.  We ordered a thick crust pizza. We got one that was paper thin.  I told the waitress "I think that there was a mistake".  She went and talked to what I assumed to be the manager.  They â€¦More

name: Denita Wills
text: Good food friendly staff. Owner makes amazing jam!!

name: Sharron O'Donnell
text: Nice people, goog food, reasonable price.

name: Tracy Kroll
text: Love love love the bacon cheese sticks and the pizza was amazing!! The service was great and the prices were better!!

name: roshaun valentine
text: Friendly people great food

name: Allan Milne
text: Good meeting place for kids parties. Excellent pizza, friendly staff.

name: David Sherwood
text: Excellent pizza! We ordered extra crispy thin crust.  Very good!

name: Guy Johnson
text: Service is good. The pizza and breadsticks were very good. The place is clean.

name: Chantile Ferriera
text: Best calzone I've ever had!
